articles.title: What Am I Looking For in a Job?
articles.description: Along with what I can provide for a company.

articles.title: Adam Bandola's Website
articles.contents:
Welcome to my website, I hope you enjoy it. Below is everything that is needed to know about it!
The  Welcome  tab is where you can find out a little bit about me. This includes my education, experience and campus involvement. It also has links to my email, LinkedIn and Github url’s.  The  Relevant Projects  tab is where you can find projects that I have completed, on my own, throughout my courses. It showcases a portion of my skills, however, my skills are not limited to those only shown on this tab.  The reason for me creating this site is rather simple. I wanted a way to showcase my abilities outside of a resume and to offer a more interactive method to get to know me. Consider this website as my virtual handshake to you, from me.
With that being said, I urge you to explore the website to your liking and if you have any questions, or want to contact me via email or LinkedIn, please feel free to reach out!

            Hello!
            Thank you for checking out my personal site! A little bit about me is that I am a Business Analytics major studying at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio and am graduating in May of 2021. I am well versed in the use of R and have knowledge regarding Python, SQl, Tableau and more. I am passionate about the use of technology and data in modern business environments.
            I am currently searching for a job, if you are interested in learning more about me or have any positions available then feel free to reach out via email! Otherwise, I would encourage you to connect with me on Linkedin.
            
            
            Education
            Miami University | Oxford, OH
            B.A. in Business Analytics | August 2017 - Current
            MMBA: miniMBA Certificate | January 2021
            
            
            Experience
            Textron Marine and Land Systems | IT Leadership Development Program Intern | June 2020 - August 2020Miami University Baseball Management | Data Analyst | June 2020 - December 2020
            
            
            Campus Involvement
            Information Systems & Analytics Organization | President | August 2019- Current
